climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX MADE IN GREEN products are tested for harmful substances and made in safer workplaces with reduced environmental impacts.

features: 🍃USDA Certified 100% Biobased Facial Towel - We just took your beauty products and made them even better, for you, and for our planet. We’re proud to introduce the world’s #1 disposable face towel, made out of 100% Biobased, USDA Certified & dermatologist approved fibers.
🍃 SAY NO TO BACTERIA - Did you know that regular towels gather bacteria even after one use when left to dry? Standard towels also carry dead skin cells and can easily spread viruses.

🍃 EXTRA ABSORBENT & GREAT FOR REMOVING MAKEUP - Absorbent enough to dry your face & hands, and can be used to easily remove makeup once wet, either with a cleanser or plain water. It can also be used for body, hands and fingertips.
🍃 PURELY CLEAN - Chemical free, 100% natural & unscented, ideal for sensitive skin and for traveling.

🍃 We DO NOT test our products on animals. This product is a dry towel, intended for drying your face or to be combined with a wet facial product of your choice. Not to be used as a scrubbing accessory. Remember to add your favorite skincare products. Please try this product on a small area of the skin prior to full application. Wait 24 hours. If your skin doesn’t agree with the product, please don’t use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite thing
reviews.reviewText: I live in an apartment without a washer and dryer so I bought these for when I don’t have any clean wash cloths but still need to wash my face. I will now be buying them to use exclusively because they are so convenient and work really well!I’ve always wondered how sanitary it is to use the same wash cloths over and over- even after washing. Wash cloths can trap mold or keep old makeup stains no matter how many times you wash them. These give you a fresh new towelette every time and my skin seems to have improved since using them.They have a textured side and a flat side and the size is very generous. I was concerned that these might be a paper towel texture or shred after wetting them, but neither is true. They are high quality and feel like a much more hygienic product to be using on my face every day. These are a new staple convenience item for me and they would be amazing for travel. I find the box they come in to be sufficient but I know they sell a sturdy, more aesthetic box to hold your towels. The box it comes in is perfect for me, though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these towels and especially in the XL size!
reviews.reviewText: These Clean Skin Club towels are great! Perfect size and so soft. Works well with my sensitive skin, and my face feels so clean and soft after washing and then drying with these! Much cleaner compared to when I was using traditional bathroom hand towels. I love them so much, I now have a monthly subscription for them! I’ve been using them since November, and feel good about the switch! They are really good for traveling too. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it for me.
reviews.reviewText: I have extremely sensitive skin, and when I am not taking care of my skin, it shows. I started using these over a year ago, and about 2 months ago I ran out. I did not order any until last week, and I tell you what - I can absolutely tell the difference between using these and a regular washcloth or towel. Mind you, I try not to scrub my face with either type of towel (I try to only pat dry as needed after washing) but at the end of the day I need to get my face clean whether I wash it properly or not. These are AMAZING. They are great if you only need to pat dry, and they are even better when you need to wet them down and wipe your face clean. They are soft and absorbent, not flimsy at all, and I can even wipe my face, rinse the towel, and wipe my face again without it breaking down. They suggest using them to wipe down your countertops after using before you throw them away, and I very often do this before tossing.I will also say, I am not a huge fan of disposable products - especially when there are easy reusable alternatives, but unfortunately for me this is one time that I allow myself to purchase disposable. The difference they make for me is absolutely worth it. They are also great to travel with - I stashed a few in a ziplock bag and take with me anytime I travel. I whole-heartedly recommend.Note: While I do like the size of the towels, I also sometimes cut them in half to get more uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Let me start off by saying, I geek out over things like this. I first purchased these about a few weeks ago when I decided to start taking care of my face and doing a routine AM & PM. These are hands down my favorite face product! I know how that sounds but that’s how convenient and useful these paper towels are. They’re very comfy, soft, good on the skin. Me and my significant other don’t notice a smell but I have read other reviews that say they dislike the smell.Moving forward these are a necessity and will always be used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did not expect this
reviews.reviewText: I got these on a whim as they popped up while I was searching for something here. I am so impressed with how it has helped my skin. I used my face towel/hand towel 3-4 days without washing it not thinking twice on germs etc. In 1 week, my skin is clearer, and I have had no breakouts. I did not have acne much but a zit here and there. I love the ease and that I can wipe the sink and counter after, it's very satisfying. I love it so much I got the bamboo container to hold them. I will never use a towel again. LOVE LOVE them. I use my hand mostly to use my cleanser as I have rosacea and I need gentle, but I have been cutting these in half every so often and using one half as my washcloth to get a bit of a more exfoliating action going and no irritation or flushing. The box also looks very pretty on my counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Confused on the Near Perfect Ratings
reviews.reviewText: Being generous with a 4 star review. Honest thoughts after using for more than a month.Pros: they are soft and absorbent. True: they are large (I wish they were smaller). Cons: they have a weird smell like chemicals or a doctor’s office that’s not pleasant. I haven’t seen an improvement in my skin. They are so large and absorbent it feels wasteful. I read a review that said the user cuts them in half. Don’t really have time for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more wash-cloths!!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these “towels”—no more weekly washing and drying of my special face towels that took forever to dry and I was never quite sure they were completely clean as they had to be washed in cold and dried on low. These are absorbent, can be used to wipe the sink up after I wash, and my ultra-sensitive skin is happy. As other reviews mentioned, yes, they have a slight odor to them, it is not unpleasant and I suspect due to the material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got rid of my wash clothes and started using these! I have a knew love! These get all my makeup or dirt off it’s soft on my skin and durable! These are a forever staple in my home, car, purse and work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Saw so many ads for this product, decided to try. Yes, a super product. Excellent for just drying your face or removing a face mask. I also dry and keep the used towels and they are perfect for using in my weekly cleaning of the bathrooms. Yes, they may be a little expensive for what they are but I have had NO more blemishes since using them. I especially like that I dont have to use hotel towels when we are away. I have no idea what products they use in their laundry. Another tip is sometimes I cut the towel in half and it is still more than enough to dry your face.

Was really looking forward to try the product, in fact I bought 2 boxes (50 each). First time I used it, I had a reaction (redness, splotchy and irritated) but thought maybe it was from my skincare product. Used it again a second time and unfortunately had the same reaction. A real shame as it is not the cheapest as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They’re really thick and nice size! I use daily and love it for travel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2024
